title: Shoe Police
description: Elisabeth Shue is Detective Lacey Sole and she’s on the case.
quote: Hey, look at this. No tongue. Looks like someone didn’t want the shoe to talk.
altHero: Detective Lacey Sole and her partner examine a shoe at a murder crime scene
alt1: a wide shot of the crime scene at a shipping dock
alt3: Detective Sole examines a shoe on the foot of a corpse
alt4: a Dr. Martin boot wears a stethescope and smokes a cigarette
